Category.Name: Forms
Category.Description: Get the user’s details to authenticate, create a profile, and enter credit card information for online payment portal.

Page.Name: Login with Social Icon
Page.Description: Add this page to your application if you want a login page containing social network icons with validations.

Page.Name: Login
Page.Description: If you want a simple and clean authentication form with Validations, just add this page to your application.

Page.Name: Sign Up
Page.Description: This is a supporting form for a simple login page with validations that can be modified to match any of your login pages on the fly.

Page.Name: Reset Password
Page.Description: This page is used for resetting a password with existing credentials or signing up if the user doesn’t have credentials yet.

Page.Name: Forgot Password
Page.Description: This page follows a login page through a Forgot Password option. If a username does not exist, users can easily sign up.

Page.Name: Tabbed Login
Page.Description: This page is a multi-tabbed user interface where one tab provides a login page and another tab provides a sign-up form.

Page.Name: Card Payment
Page.Description: This page displays your card information involves many validations including type of Card, Expire date and CVV.

Page.Name: Add Profile
Page.Description: This page allows users to add a new entry to their contacts with additional information such as name and phone number.

Page.Name: Business Registration Form
Page.Description: This page allows users to add business details such as name, email address, and phone number.

Category.Name: Catalog
Category.Description: Let the users select from the list of items that includes titles, brief descriptions, and photos.

Page.Name: Category Tile
Page.Description: Displaying an image with a title is a scenario in most applications, and this page categorize product images and category title.

Page.Name: Catalog Tile
Page.Description: Showcase a set of products with an image, short description, price, and user rating as tiles.

Page.Name: Catalog List
Page.Description: Showcase a set of products with the image, short description, price, and its user rating as a list.

Page.Name: Article List
Page.Description: Showcase a set of cards with an image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read the article as list.

Page.Name: Article Tile
Page.Description: Showcase a set of cards with an image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read the article in tile view.

Page.Name: Product Home
Page.Description: Display featured articles with a rotator at the top and the remaining stories displayed as tiles.

Page.Name: Event List
Page.Description: This page shows a list of events in a tabbed view with different sections displaying the name, month, date and venue for event.

Page.Name: Article Card
Page.Description: This page shows articles as cards containing a picture, title, author, publication date, and time needed to read the article.

Page.Name: Travel planner
Page.Description: This page shows a card view of travel destinations, plus top locations and the best places.

Category.Name: Detail
Category.Description: Display detailed and relevant information with random layouts.

Page.Name: Product Detail
Page.Description: Showcase a product with different images and other complete details about the product such its prize, variants and reviews.

Page.Name: Article Detail
Page.Description: This page displays an article with the title, image, and text.

Page.Name: Event Detail
Page.Description: This page shows event details, featuring a picture, event name, venue, time, and an option to join the event.

Page.Name: Data Table
Page.Description: This page shows a table of all teams including their rankings, number of players, and points with their win/loss record as well.

Page.Name: My Address
Page.Description: This page displays saved address.

Page.Name: Room Booking
Page.Description: This page displays a complete detail of a resort available for rent with different images and other details.

Category.Name: Chat
Category.Description: Exchange messages with users or customers inside your app and manage multiple conversations at once.

Page.Name: Recent Chat
Page.Description: This page displays a recent conversation in a chat application that allows you to access the chat information of a user on tapping.

Page.Name: Chat Conversation
Page.Description: This page displays a recent conversation with a contact in a chat application.

Category.Name: Article
Category.Description: Organize blog posts in an easy-to-navigate layout.

Page.Name: Article Detail with Comments
Page.Description: This page displays an article with the title, image, and text.

Page.Name: Article Parallax Header
Page.Description: This page displays an article with a pleasant parallax effect.

Page.Name: My Article
Page.Description: This page displays an article with the title, image, and text with customized layout.

Category.Name: Reviews and Ratings
Category.Description: Let your users provide ratings and text feedback.

Page.Name: Feedback
Page.Description: This page lists the feedback received about a product with an author name, date, description, and rating.

Page.Name: Review
Page.Description: This page allows the user to update their rating, images, and description about their experience with the product.

Category.Name: Contact Us
Category.Description: Capture user contact information so you can get in touch with them later.

Page.Name: Contact Us
Page.Description: This page displays the location of an organization address in a map and it also provides options to review a message from user.

Category.Name: About Us
Category.Description: Create a simple About Us page that tells users who you are.

Page.Name: Simple About Us
Page.Description: This page displays organization information with its logo displayed at the top of the page followed by a short description.

Page.Name: About Us Page with Cards
Page.Description: This page displays organization information with cards. Shadow effects on the cards provide an extraordinary look and feel.

Page.Name: About Us Page with Scrolling
Page.Description: This page displays organization information with scrolling effects.

Category.Name: Navigation
Category.Description: Enable your users to navigate between pages or items at a high level.

Page.Name: Navigation List Card
Page.Description: This page displays items in a list. Each card carries an image, description, and the overall rating of an item.

Page.Name: Navigation Tile Card
Page.Description: This page displays items in a tile layout. Each tile contains an image, description, and the overall rating of an item.

Page.Name: Songs
Page.Description: This page displays items in a tile layout. Each tile contains an image, the name of a song, and its composer.

Page.Name: FAQs
Page.Description: This page displays items in an expander layout. Each item contains a question and answer for a FAQ section.

Page.Name: Contacts List
Page.Description: This page displays a list of contacts and avatars.

Page.Name: Songs Play List
Page.Description: This page displays items in a tile layout. Each tile contains the name of a song and its composer, and a menu icon.

Page.Name: Movies List
Page.Description: This page displays items in a tile layout. Each tile contains the name, year of release, and ratings of a movie.

Page.Name: Names List
Page.Description: This page displays group names as a list.

Page.Name: Restaurant
Page.Description: This page displays Restaurant lists, items description, Offers and an overall rating.

Page.Name: Icon Names List
Page.Description: The icon names list page displays contact lists with icons and a Next option.

Page.Name: Suggestion
Page.Description: A suggestion page shows profile names and IDs, and an option to follow accounts.

Page.Name: App Usage
Page.Description: This page shows the usage of apps, app names, progress bars and their values.

Page.Name: Documents List
Page.Description: This page shows a list of documents, displaying the document's name, size, and the time it was last updated.

Page.Name: Selectable Name Page
Page.Description: This page shows a selectable list of names with grouping.

Page.Name: Movies Page
Page.Description: This page shows a list of movies organized by now showing, trailers, and upcoming releases.

Page.Name: File Explorer List
Page.Description: This page shows files, folders and their names, and information such as date, time, and the number of items in folders.

Page.Name: File Explorer Grid
Page.Description: This page shows a list of folders in a grid view that includes the name of the folder and the number of items in it.

Category.Name: Error and Empty
Category.Description: Alert users to errors, empty shopping carts, task lists, item selections, and more.

Page.Name: Empty Cart
Page.Description: This page represents a cart that doesn’t have any items with an illustrated empty cart image.

Page.Name: Location Denied
Page.Description: This page represents a location that cannot be accessed with an illustrated location image.

Page.Name: No Credits
Page.Description: This page represents a user without any credits with an illustrated credit image.

Page.Name: No Internet Connection
Page.Description: This page represents an unavailable internet connection with an illustrated internet connectivity image.

Page.Name: No Item
Page.Description: This page displays an illustrated empty box image that represents that no items are selected.

Page.Name: No Photos
Page.Description: This page is presented to users who have not selected any photos.

Page.Name: No Tasks
Page.Description: This page represents that a task is not assigned to the user with an illustration.

Page.Name: Not Enough Credits
Page.Description: This page provides information to a user who doesn’t have enough credits to access benefits.

Page.Name: No Videos
Page.Description: This page displays an illustrated video image that represents that no videos are selected.

Page.Name: Payment Failed
Page.Description: This page provides an alert to a user that their payment has failed.

Page.Name: Something Went Wrong
Page.Description: This page is used to show when an error occurs, but the actual error is undetermined.

Category.Name: Transaction
Category.Description: Pages for communicating the status of a purchase through an online shop to the user. This category includes pages for successful payments and payment failures.

Page.Name: Checkout
Page.Description: This page provides options to choose between various addresses to deliver a product to and receives user payment information.

Page.Name: Payment Success
Page.Description: This page notifies users about their successful payments.

Page.Name: Payment Failure
Page.Description: This page notifies users about their failed payments.

Page.Name: Saved Cards
Page.Description: This page displays saved cards.

Category.Name: Bookmark
Category.Description: Interfaces for users to save shopping items, articles, or pages they’d like to return to later. Users can add or remove items they’ve saved as needed.

Page.Name: Wishlist
Page.Description: This page displays a list of items that an online shopper has saved to potentially purchase later.

Page.Name: Cart
Page.Description: Displays a list of products added to the ecommerce application’s cart. Also, allows the user to remove the products from cart.

Page.Name: Article Bookmarks
Page.Description: Displays bookmarked articles in a list with the image, title, author name, created date, and estimated time to read.

Category.Name: History
Category.Description: Displays a list of recent actions performed by the user. It can also be used to show the recent transactions in financial apps or recent purchases in shopping apps.

Page.Name: Transaction History
Page.Description: This page displays the list of recent transactions.

Page.Name: My Orders
Page.Description: This page displays the list of the user’s recent orders.

Category.Name: Social
Category.Description: Layouts for social media profile pages with different features, such as follower counts, profile pictures, biographical information, and related profiles.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Connections
Page.Description: This page displays a social media profile page with links to other profiles that the user may be interested in.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Card
Page.Description: This page displays a social media profile with a user’s image, location, and biographical information presented on a card.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Interest
Page.Description: This page displays a social media profile with a image, location, interests, and biographical information of user in a card view.

Page.Name: Social Profile with Message
Page.Description: Displays a social media profile page with links to other profiles that may be of interest to the user.

Category.Name: Profile
Category.Description: Display various user profiles related to an article, chat user, and more.

Page.Name: Author Profile
Page.Description: This page displays the author’s profile image and name, which can be edited by the author.

Page.Name: Contacts
Page.Description: This page displays a contact’s profile in a chat application.

Page.Name: Chat Profile
Page.Description: This page displays the user’s profile in a chat application.

Page.Name: Master
Page.Description: This page displays an interactive burger menu of article pages.

Page.Name: Health Profile
Page.Description: This page shows health details including age, weight, height, calories eaten, heart rate, water consumed, and sleep duration.

Category.Name: Tracking
Category.Description: Displays various trackings like train status, product delivery status, and more.

Page.Name: Product Delivery Tracking
Page.Description: This page displays a live train’s present status with the estimated time of arrival at a specified destination.

Category.Name: Dashboard
Category.Description: A beautifully presented interface relevant to common real-world use cases.

Page.Name: Stock Overview
Page.Description: This page displays a dashboard for stock market data visualization.

Page.Name: Health Care
Page.Description: This page displays a dashboard for health-care data visualization.

Page.Name: Daily Calories Report
Page.Description: This page displays a dashboard visualizing a daily calorie report.

Page.Name: My Wallet
Page.Description: This page shows income and expense charts as well as transaction details.

Category.Name: Settings
Category.Description: Display various types of settings pages.

Page.Name: Setting
Page.Description: This page displays a simple settings page that includes account, notification, and support settings.

Page.Name: Help
Page.Description: This page displays a simple help page that provides help with recent orders and other queries.

Category.Name: Notification
Category.Description: Display various types of notification pages.

Page.Name: Task Notification
Page.Description: This page displays notifications for tasks, showing descriptions, task IDs, and times.

Page.Name: Social Notification
Page.Description: This page displays social media notifications, containing a list of recent notifications and a list of earlier ones.

Page.Name: E-commerce Notification
Page.Description: This page displays e-commerce notifications that include description and time.
